Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Interface LineOfSightStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectFireStrategy, IndirectFireStrategy
    public interface LineOfSightStrategy
    Line of sight strategy, to compute the line of sight modifier.
    See Also:
    DirectFireStrategy, IndirectFireStrategy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int MAX_VISIBILITY_MODIFIER
      Maximum visibility modifier that still maintains line of sight.
      static int OUT_OF_SIGHT
      Out of sight modifier value, guaranteed to be at least 4096.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int modifier​(Iterable<Tile> tiles)
      Get line of sight modifier to target.

    • Field Detail

      • OUT_OF_SIGHT

        static final int OUT_OF_SIGHT
        Out of sight modifier value, guaranteed to be at least 4096.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_VISIBILITY_MODIFIER

        static final int MAX_VISIBILITY_MODIFIER
        Maximum visibility modifier that still maintains line of sight.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • modifier

        int modifier​(Iterable<Tile> tiles)
        Get line of sight modifier to target.
        Parameters:
        tiles - iterable of tiles from attacking unit (inclusive) to target unit (inclusive)
        Returns:
        line of sight modifier, LineOfSightStrategy.OUT_OF_SIGHT if target cannot be seen
